snippet.title: PAIN Game Trailer
snippet.description:
It's the funniest game in town!  Load characters into a super-sized, ultra-powerful launcher and fire them into an active, physics-controlled environment filled with precarious and humorous situations. Players receive points by stringing together painful collisions and inducing chaos in the environment. With one of the craziest cast of characters to ever appear in a game, get ready for unruly monkeys in need of a spanking, exploding teddy bears, clown tossing, and plenty more.

PAIN © 2007 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.
